events.name: Make & Monetize Your Android Apps with Google
events.description:
Android In Asia in conjunction with Google is hosting an evening for developers!  Listen to Googlers and learn about products like Firebase, Play Game services & Google Play distribution that can drastically reduce development times and help you goto market quickly. Thanks to a special section on AdMob for learning monetization tricks & tips for your mobile apps. Light refreshments will be served. Register and Join us ! RSVP:  https://events.withgoogle.com/make-and-monetize-singapore-mar-2016/ When - March 29th 2016 , 17:30 - 19:00 hrs SGT. Where - Blk 71, Ayer Rajah Crescent, #02-01, NUS Enterprise, Singapore 139951 Topics covered - Google's tools to help startups build better productsSome best practices in distributing your apps on Google PlayLearn how to monetize your apps with AdMobQA & Networking to follow 


Our Sponsors: Hired.com  NUS Enterprise 

 Android In Asia - Visit http://androidinasia.com to keep tap on what's happening in the world of Android in asia!
events.location: NUS Enterprise@Blk71, 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent, #02-01, Singapore 139951

events.name: End to end: Mobile DevOps
events.description:
We're going to walk through the entire DevOps process of a mobile application. We will set up, from scratch, and walk through the following: 1) Create a project on Visual Studio Team Services 2) Check in code to a git repository 3) Set up automated builds (Continuous integration) 4) Set up cloud based UI testing with Perfecto Mobile 5) Release the application to HockeyApp (For beta testing) BYOD for hands on follow through if you want, lab sheets will be provided. ** 1 ReSharper license give away ** 


Food will served at 6.45 as usual
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, Level 22, Room CF12, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore 018989

events.name: March Meetup
events.description:
Hi folks!  We look forward to having you join us for our March meetup, on the 29th, venue @ honestbee, #04-01B Delta House, 2 Alexandra Road, 159919. We're still looking for speakers! Ping us (Winston or Guo Xiang) if your company would like to sponsoror if you'd like to do a 10-15min talk or 5 Random Ruby Tips.  See you on the 29th! Venue:  honestbee, #04-01B Delta House, 2 Alexandra Road, 159919 -------------- 1. "Continuous Update" by @winstonyw from @jollygoodcode 2. "Enterprise Integration with Ruby" by @code_ssl from IDA    3. "5 Random Ruby Tips" by Wei Liang from @tinkerbox 4. Announcements * Hot Picks- This is a 5-10 minutes session during which anyone canstand up and say something interesting!  -------------- Would you like to speak at our future meetups? You could share about your startup technology stack,your new RubyGem, or your opinions on best practices,so that people can get to know how awesome you are! We also have a 5min section on "5 Random Ruby Tips"that you can volunteer for - I am sure you must havecame across some interesting Ruby nuggets in thelast month right? So don't be shy! Step forward and share your knowledge! Ping Winston @winstonyw / winstonyw@gmail.com,or Guo Xiang @tgx_world / tgx_world@hotmail.com See you all soon! --------------Job Postings-------------- Are you looking for Rubyists? Do you have a job posting?Email us a blurb (< 50 words) + link and we'll put it her -------------- Thank You, Sponsors! Venue:  


Food and Drinks:
events.location: Honestbee, #04-01B Delta House, 2 Alexandra Road, 159919, Singapore
